item.title: Hugo-Sewing Introduction
item.description: Hugo-Sewing is a simple, clean and flexible Hugo theme for both personal blog, group website, and academic website. Demo site Background Hugo-Sewing is heavily based on Hugo-Xmin, with modifications mainly inspired by Shayan Hosseini’s website and Hugo-Holy: The base of Hugo-ht is Yihui Xie’s Hugo-Xmin. The academic layout (“Home”, “Project”, “Publication”, and “People”) is modified the code from Shayan Hosseini’s website. The visual styles (navigation, index list, and footer) based on the Hugo-Holy theme by SerKo.
